summary: POWER WINDOWS WILL NOT OPERATE. THIS IS THE FORTH POWER WINDOW REGULATOR REPLACEMENT IN THREE SEPARATE WINDOWS THAT I HAVE HAD TO HAVE FIXED. TWO OF THESE REGULATORS BROKE IN ONE WEEKEND. I BELIEVE GENERAL MOTORS IS AWARE OF A PROBLEM WITH THE NUMBER OF COMPLAINTS AND WITH THE SERVICE BULLETIN 9908110008 ISSUED ON SEP. 1,1999 STATING THAT THE UPPER REG. ATTACHING BOLT MAY BE TOO FAR FOWARD AND NEEDS BOLT HOLE ELONGATED SO WINDOW GLASS DOES NOT BIND WHEN ROLLING UP WINDOW. THIS FAILURE RECORD IS COSTING ME AND OTHER CONSUMERS COSTLY.    *JB
